message: With the Oval Tower destroyed, Platinum Jail ceased to function.
But thanks to prompt intervention from the mainland, the chaos was quickly resolved.
The tower collapsed because of a malfunction in Platinum Jail's central control system. Beyond that, details are scarce.
By some miracle, everyone in the tower managed to escape with, at worst, minor injuries.
Apparently, they all received a message alerting them before the building's collapse.
However, a number of people窶品ncluding Toue himself窶病re still missing.

The incident brought Toue's mind control research to light. The Celebration, which was a cover for his largest experiment yet, was canceled.

It might have put all of Midorijima under his control.

The Toue Corporation's products and services窶品ncluding Allmates窶婦ere transferred to other corporations.

Rhyme, too, changed hands. Usui was replaced.
And thus, bit by bit, the shadow of the Toue Corporation was lifted from my town.
Now, the people of Midorijima are working hard to return it to its former glory.
I haven't seen Noiz since, but I hear rumors of his gang's activities.
Clear pops into Hum-Drum Junk on occasion.
I haven't heard a word from Mink, but it'd take a lot more than that to put him down.
Mizuki regained consciousness. He hasn't been released from the hospital yet, but he always looks so happy when I go to visit.
As for me, those awful headaches are gone now. Completely. It's almost like I never had them.
The sensation in my hair has started to fade too... together with his presence inside me.
I can tell he's still there, but it's kind of like he's sleeping, deep inside my heart.
I'd be lying if I said I had no worries at all, but despite everything, things have been shockingly calm since the incident.
After the tower collapsed, Koujaku and I, along with the Beni-Shigures, returned to the Old Residential District.
Koujaku passed out on the way back and spent some time in the hospital.
The tattoo was part of it, but he was mostly just exhausted, physically and mentally.
He slept for three days straight, which worried the hell out of me, but once he woke up, he was back to his old self in no time.
After that, we slowly got back to our normal routine.
And now, about one week later...
I'm sitting behind the counter at Hum-Drum Junk like always.
I saw Koujaku the day he was discharged from the hospital, but we haven't gotten together since.
I hope he's doing alright.
I heard he closed up shop. Is he feeling okay?
Just then, the door opens.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Welcome!"
I take my elbows off the counter and sit up straight.
Instead of perusing the shelves, the customer heads straight for the counter.
They must want to place an order.
But then―

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku!"
I realize that it's Koujaku.
He flashes me his familiar smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "Feels like it's been ages, man. How you doin'?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Y-Yeah, good. How 'bout you?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Good. Completely back to normal."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I heard you closed up shop, though."

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh... Well, that's a little, uh... complicated."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"
Maybe he isn't quite back to normal after all.
For some reason, I feel restless.
Maybe it's just because we haven't seen each other in a while, but I get the impression he feels the same.

name: 紅雀
message: "Anyway, so, you got some time after work?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure."

name: 紅雀
message: "I haven't been to your place in a while. Gettin' homesick."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Homesick...? Well, you can come, but Granny's not home today. She said she'd be out late at a council meeting."

name: 紅雀
message: "Fine by me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You weren't angling to get some of her cooking?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Look, I just wanna talk. About... stuff."
Koujaku looks me in the eye, seeking confirmation that I understand.
Admittedly, I have a pretty good idea what he wants to talk about.
We made it back in one piece, and everything's settled down, but...
I mean, so much happened in such a short time.
Not just with the island, but also between me and Koujaku.
I want to take my time and talk it out with him too.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Got it. How about I call you when I'm done here?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Cool. I'll be waiting. See ya."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
Koujaku nods and leaves with a wave.
...He wants to talk.
I lean back on the counter and sigh.
It's not like I'm imagining anything specific, but...
For some reason, my heart beats faster.
